game.name: DEATHWATCH
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 추적되는 컨트롤러 지원, VR 지원, 통계, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: You've been tasked to observe supposedly haunted locations. Observe and log paranormal events and use the tools at your disposal to gather data on any potential paranormal threats and exterminate them if necessary.
game.shortDescriptionEn: You've been tasked to observe supposedly haunted locations. Observe and log paranormal events and use the tools at your disposal to gather data on any potential paranormal threats and exterminate them if necessary.
